content:
Selemeng's cats 
 Khothatso Ranosi and Marion 
 Drew 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Selemeng loves cats. 
 
 
 
 There are many cats 
 
 at her house. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Selemeng has one 
 
 black cat. 
 
 
 
 This cat eats 
 
 a lot of meat. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Selemeng has one 
 
 fat cat. 
 
 
 
 This cat eats 
 
 everything. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Cat number thre, 
 
 runs up a tre. 
 
 
 
 This cat gets stuck 
 
 in the tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Selemeng climbs 
 
 the tre. 
 
 
 
 She gets stuck 
 
 with cat thre. 
 
 
 
 Selemeng's mother 
 
 has to help 
 
 
 them get down. 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Selemeng has two 
 
 lazy cats. 
 
 
 
 They lie outside 
 
 in the sun 
 
 al day. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Selemeng has thre 
 
 busy cats. 
 
 
 
 They catch rats 
 
 in the kitchen 
 
 at night. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Selemeng has 
 
 one dog. 
 
 
 
 His name is 
 
 Lirafi. 
 
 
 
 Lirafi has 
 
 no friends. 
 
 
 He is sad. 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Selemeng's cats 
 
 do not like 
 
 Lirafi. 
 
 
 
 They chase him 
 
 out of the house. 
 
 
 
 Lirafi runs away. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 Selmeng finds Lirafi 
 
 and brings him 
 
 home. 
 
 
 
 The cats are not 
 
 hapy. 
 
 
 
 They do not 
 
 want to se 
 
 
 Lirafi again. 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 How many cats 
 
 does Selemeng 
 
 have? 
 
 
 
 She has eight 
 
 cats. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 How many dogs 
 
 does Selemeng 
 
 have? 
 
 
 
 She has one dog. 
 
 
 
 Where is Lirafi 
 
 now? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 12  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 How many cats 
 
 do you have 
 
 at home? 
 
 
 
 How many dogs 
 
 do you have 
 
 at home? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 13
